fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Extra Fluffy**: Discard a random card, draw 2 defense cards. (2 uses, 2 night cooldown.)
- **Hug**: Reforge a card, it must be a defense card. On the last ability use, it also upgrades the card. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - **Masked**: Your first attack card played is reforged.
